title: Murder: First on Scene
overview: Murder: First on Scene is an in depth look at how the police and specialists in the UK and US bring the perpetrators of murder to justice.The series will look at the investigation through the eyes of those first on scene, the police, the experts called in and the prosecuting lawyers.This dramatically shot series will follow the timeline of 10 real life murder cases uncovering the intricate nature and the ingenious methods used by the police to catch a killer. Each case will be brought to life through personal testimonials and stylised reconstruction.
